Html:
Just a friendly heads up, your wonderful RateIt plugin (the latest version 1.0.1) doesn't seem to work with the version 1.6.2 of jQuery. Stars don't show and/or don't seem to have any width, and values don't set correctly if you try to hard-set the widths with CSS and then give a rating.

Apologies if you already knew this or that didn't make sense.

Works fine with 1.6.1.

I'll have a look later on, but to my best knowledge, the samples page runs on jQuery 1.6.2

Gidon

Sent from my iPhone

On 13 ביול 2011, at 18:27, "rocktronica" <notifications@codeplex.com> wrote:

From: rocktronica

Just a friendly heads up, your wonderful RateIt plugin (the latest version 1.0.1) doesn't seem to work with the version 1.6.2 of jQuery. Stars don't show and/or don't seem to have any width, and values don't set correctly if you try to hard-set the widths with CSS and then give a rating.

Apologies if you already knew this or that didn't make sense.

Works fine with 1.6.1.

Indeed, my sample use 1.6.1, and on 1.6.2 some of the samples don't work. 

I'll dive in to it tomorrow.
Let me know if you need help testing or anything.
Uploaded a fixed version. Had to break compatibility with anything older than 1.6.x.
